job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: strongBest company to work for in the Triangle hands downbrbrstrongThis Jobot Job is hosted by Craig RosecransbrbrAre you a fit Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply button and sending us your resumebrbrSalary 100000  185000 per yearbrbrstrongA Bit About UsbrbrstrongJobot is seeking a Machine Learning Engineer who will be part of a team that leads the way in bringing artificial intelligence and machine learning into the very processes and systems that impact how customers are served This is an exciting opportunity to make an impact with by leveraging AI and ML techniques to create production level systems through application of machine learning modelsbrbrstrongbrbrstrongWhy join usbrbrbrstrongstrongWe are the fastest growing startup in NC amp are known for our incredibly tight knit culture We love what we do amp believe in empowering our people to be as creative and entrepreneurial as humanly possible We are looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to join our talented team of Engineers and ScientistsbrbrstrongJob DetailsbrbrstrongstrongResponsibilitiesbrstrongulli Designing and developing ML modelslili Working individually and part of a team to improve currently models and implement new techniqueslili Offer technical recommendations on improvements across processesbrliulstrongQualificationsbrstrongulli Masters or PhD in Computer Science or similar disciplinelili 4 years commercial experiencelili Strong experience within Machine Learninglili Experience in at least 12 of the following Deep Learning Computer Vision NLPlili Programming Python JavabrliulInterested in hearing more Easy Apply now by clicking the Apply buttonbrbr
